onPlayingChanged(android.support.v4.medi.Description: The play state of the transport changed. Use @B_android#support#v4#media#TransportController#isPlaying_E@ to determine the new state.

onTransportControlsChanged(android.suppo.Description: The available controls of the transport changed. Use @B_android#support#v4#media#TransportController#getTransportControlFlags_E@ TransportController.getTransportControlFlags()} to determine the new state.

ClassDesc: A listener for playback changes that can be registered with @B_android#support#v4#media#TransportController_E@.
